aboutMe: Hey, my name is Ashwin and I just graduated from Mountain View High School in California. I started coding in my sophomore year of high school, where I learned languages like Java, C, & Python. From there I branched out on my own & learned web based languages such as HTML, CSS, & Javascript, as well as frameworks such as React.
aboutMore: My hobbies include swimming & athletics in general, hanging out with my family and friends, & reading Calvin and Hobbes.

activities.message: I was a Captain of the MVHS varsity swim team, and have been a part of the school Varsity Swim Team for every year of High School. I also swim year-round for LAMVAC, a local competitive swim club
My swim career has caused me to pursue being a lifeguard and am also CPR & First-Aid certified
I participate in many clubs throughout my school including Spartan Buddies, which I have been apart of for the past 4 years, as well as the CS Club and others

rightNow.message: My class-load this semester includes: COMP SCI 300 — PROGRAMMING II,  COMP SCI 220 — DATA SCIENCE PROGRAMMING I, PSYCH 202 — INTRODUCTION TO PSYCHOLOGY, HIST SCI 150 — THE DIGITAL AGE

rightNow.title: UW-Madison
rightNow.message: I am exicted start my fall semester and become a UW badger!.

rightNow.title: Personal Projects
rightNow.message: As of right now I am working on projects that will help improve my progamming skills. I want to get more practice with C++/C#, TypeScript, Gatsby, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, as well as learn Next.js
